item.title: Gender Roles with Text Mining and N-grams
item.description: Stan is freedom-respecting, open-source software for facilitating statistical inference at the frontiers of applied statistics. Or to put it another way, it makes Bayesian inference fast. StanCon is the premier conference for all things Stan related. image = “img/2017/stan.png” showonlyimage = false date = “2016-11-05T19:44:32+05:30” title = “Official StanCon Sponsor” draft = false weight = 2
